text_block_list.text: I signed a contract with Hokko Tarumae and spent days training for a mock race.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Instantaneous power, startup and stamina enhancement…… Yes, it is indeed what I need now.
choice_data_list: Train hard and we will win!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Yes, sir! I'm off!
And a few days later―

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text: ―Started. Hokko Tarumae off to a good start from the inside!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Ha, ha, ha!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: (Good positioning. As per training…… now anyway, keep it here!)

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: （I'm going to win…… and I'm going to be the kind of person that Tomakomai can be proud of!)

text_block_list.name: Younger Tarumae
text_block_list.text: What? Is this restaurant going to close too? I love the Hokki rice set meal……

text_block_list.name: Tomakomai Shopping District Person
text_block_list.text: Yes, I know. I'm sorry for Tarumae and the other regulars, but we haven't had many customers lately. It's time to move on.

text_block_list.name: Younger Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Such is the case with…… Hey, hey! If we get more customers, the store, won't close!

text_block_list.name: Younger Tarumae
text_block_list.text: This is Hokko Tarumae! Do you know the most delicious "Hokki rice special" in Tomakomai?

text_block_list.name: Younger Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Today, I wanted to let you all know about the taste of the food, so after the concert, I decided to do a special food report…

text_block_list.name: Tomakomai Shopping District Person
text_block_list.text: Well…… I can't believe you're really getting more customers. Thanks, Tarumae.

text_block_list.name: Younger Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Oh, thank goodness! I guess that settles the matter, huh?

text_block_list.name: Younger Tarumae
text_block_list.text: It's been a while since I've had a hokki rice set meal, and I'm looking forward to it. ―What? Huh?

text_block_list.name: Younger Tarumae
text_block_list.text: The store…… is gone……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: (Local reconstruction is difficult. Even if you can boost it temporarily, the wave of people soon recedes…)

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: (It takes knowledge, effort, and passion to keep going. But that still doesn't absolutely stop the decline ……!)

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text: Hokko Tarumae 3, 4th― off the lead 200, 2 lengths, 3 lengths away!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: (But… But that doesn't mean I want to give up ……!)

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: (Even if things don't go well at all, even if I'm constantly reminded of it every day―I won't be weak anymore, I'm not going to lost!)

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: (I'll be the one to make Tomakomai…… Tomakomai Shine!)

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text: Hokko Tarumae coming up to second! Hokko Tarumae approaching!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Tell them aaaaaa―!

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text: Hokko Tarumae, caught! Goal in!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Ha, ha, ha, ha……! ……!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: ―I'm Hokko Tarumae from Tomakomai!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Tomakomai is warm and full of charm……! Thank you very much!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: The one she's talking about…… Tomakomai? Where is it? Do you know?

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: I may have heard of it. I think it's a town in Hokkaido isn't it? Let's check ……
Next day. Hokko Tarumae visited me in the trainer's office.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: I am so sorry! Looking back, I think that I forced you to sign a contract with me on the spur of the moment……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: But thanks to you waking me up, I know exactly what I need to do……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: I was able to focus on the feeling that I was going to win the race and…… So, you know―

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: I have a feeling that…… with you I would make a good locodol. And…… you like haskaps too.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Ah! Well, so, I mean! What I'm doing here is…

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: …… It's a bit late but.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Once again, I am Hokko Tarumae. I look forward to working with you from now on.
I hurriedly stood up and took it with both hands. The business card she offered me showed a majestic volcano, Mount Tarumae, with white smoke rising from its peak.
